page.title: 18Churches
page.content: Bildeston: St Mary Magdalene has 74 on Electoral roll.A Church Lads and Girls Brigade has recently been formed,with 25 members.An annual morning market and monthly cake stalls are held to raise funds.The side chapel contains furniture from St.Nicholas,Wattisham, which is redundant,although the burial ground is used. 1984 - Weddings 1 Baptisms 5 Funerals 6 Cremations 3.Attendances - 8am 9,11am40 Bildeston Baptist Church has 3 elders, 3 deacons and 250 members. The grave- stones have been moved to the side wall and the Parish Churchyard is used for burials.2 new wide doors for wheel- chairs are being fitted and a new lounge was built in 1984.All expenses are covered by donations and funds are raised for missionary work.The Over 60's Luncheon Club meets monthly,Sunday School and Adult & Teenage house groups
